attributes.action: Merging of Police and Armed Forces
attributes.additional_details:
Putting our homebound troops to use and providing them with long term job prospects by using them as Police Officers.

Our troops on home soil should be able to be trained and used as "normal" Police. even if it is just to make up the number during events such as the olympics or for situations that we saw this summer in tottenham.

lets make britain safer by having police on the beat.
